caption.p: Distribution of MERS-CoV weekly cases in Riyadh, Macca and Madina provinces during July, 2013â€”June, 2016. (a) The geographic distribution of MERS-CoV cases reported in 2017 in the Middle East. (b) Time series of weekly incidence data of MERS-CoV in three major provinces, Riyadh, Maccaand Madina, respectively. (c) Two strain Models flow diagram considering asymptomatic, symptomatic, hospitalized, and Zoonotic transmission. Open source KML map for the Middle East was kindly obtained and redrawn by Josep-BoyardMicheau from https://community.qlik.com/t5/Qlik-Sense-Enterprise-Documents/GCC-Middle-East-country-boundary-KML-maps-KML-Shapefile/ta-p/1478595.
